0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE VOLUNTEER RESPONDERS INCENTIVES PROTECTION PROGRAM THEREBY PROVIDING FINANCIAL AND/OR NON-PECUNIARY BENEFITS ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE WHO BECOME VICTIMS THEMSELVES OF SUCH DISASTERS, CALAMITIES OR EMERGENCIES IN THE COURSE OF DUTY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01101
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE VOLUNTEER RESPONDERS INCENTIVES PROTECTION PROGRAM THEREBY PROVIDING FINANCIAL AND/OR NON-PECUNIARY BENEFITS ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE WHO BECOME VICTIMS THEMSELVES OF SUCH DISASTERS, CALAMITIES OR EMERGENCIES IN THE COURSE OF DUTY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Villarica (008 2017-08-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-01-11
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-31
          -A technical working group was created to study the bill, together with other bills.
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-01-31
          -To be consolidated with other bills of similar subject matter.
      4. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-05-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES ON 2016-08-01
